mapper.insert: insert into user (userid, password, nick_name, name, birth, address, email, phone_number, user_type) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{userType})
mapper.select: select count(*) as result from user where userid = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name}, nick_name = #{nickName}, birth = #{birth}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber} where userid = #{userId}
mapper.delete: update user set useyn = 'n' where userid = #{userId}
